Translations.Text: quod nos revealed vos in hoc scripture est truth consummating totus proximus scriptures! DEUS est fully Cognizant DE His SERVUS Seer

Nos passed scripture generation generation nos allowed whomever nos chose noster servus receive it Subsequently some de them wronged their anima others upheld it unus part de temporis dum others est eager work righteousness prout deus testimentum hoc est major triumph
They iniit gardens Eden they adorned bracelets de gold pearls their garments it factus silk
They dictus Praise DEUS removing totus noster injuria! Noster Dominus Forgiving Appreciative
He admitted nos abode eternal bliss His gratia. Nunquam perfecit nos bored hic nunquam perfecit nos tired
Prout pro those disbelieve they incurred fire Hell ubi they nunquam clausum decessus nor est retribution ever commuted them. Nos sic requite the unappreciative

They scream therein Noster Dominus vos get nos out de hic nos work righteousness works nos used perfecit nos non dedit vos life-long chance continuous reminders those take heed Vos non receive warner? Ergo taste (consequences). transgressors habet non 1 help them
DEUS est Knower future DE CAELUM TERRA. He est Knower totus innermost thoughts
